document_name: Cabinet Resolution No. 103: which approves the National Electric Mobility Strategy (ENME)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PAN/2019/PAN-2019-01-01-Cabinet Resolution No. 103: which approves the National Electric Mobility Strategy (ENME)_987d6ae8363f63f3cedb7445d2274b78.pdf
document_description: The resolution 103/2019 approves the National Strategy for Electric Mobility (ENME) and creates the Inter-institutional Commission for Electric Mobility (CIME). The Commission's goal is to implement ENME. The strategy sets a number of electrification targets for 2030 and aims at reaching them through improvements in governance, normative action, focusing on strategic sectors and raise knowledge and education.
